## Growers details
```{r define_sites, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}



#######################################################################################################################################################
 paddock_done2020_t<- read_excel("C:/Users/ouz001/CSIRO/Ratcliff, Christina (A&F, Waite Campus) - Soil_Testing_Project/paddock_done2020.xlsx", 
                               sheet = "T-test_done")
#paddock_done2020_t<- read_excel("//Fssa2-adl/clw-share1/Microlab/value_soil_testing_prj/Yield_data/2020/processing/paddock_done2020.xlsx", 
#                              sheet = "T-test_done")

paddock_done2020_t <- paddock_done2020_t %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(paddock5_digits = substr(`Paddock code`, start = 1, stop = 5))

#select orgaiastion

selection_organisation <- "FSG"
selection_Contact <- "EPARF"
selection_Farmer <- "Kuhlmann"


paddock_done2020 <- 
  #filter(paddock_done2020_t, Organisation %in% selection_Contact) %>% 
  #filter(paddock_done2020_t, Contact %in% selection_Contact) %>%
  filter(paddock_done2020_t, Farmer %in% selection_Farmer) %>% 
  distinct(paddock5_digits, 
           `trial analysed`,
           .keep_all= TRUE) %>% 
  dplyr::select(paddock = paddock5_digits,
                Organisation,
                Contact,
                Farmer,
                `Paddock tested`,
                "type",
                `trial analysed`,
                'issues/ comments',
                'Rates excluded (recom rate analysis)' = Rates_excluded_rec_rate,
                'Rates used (low med high analysis)' = rate_used_low_high_med)   

paddock_done2020 <- paddock_done2020 %>% 
  mutate(paddock_trial_analysed = paste0(paddock, `trial analysed`))   

paddock_done2020_display <- 
  filter(paddock_done2020_t, Farmer %in% selection_Farmer) %>% 
  distinct(paddock5_digits, .keep_all= TRUE) %>% 
  dplyr::select(Paddock = paddock5_digits,
                Organisation,
                Contact,
                Farmer,
                `Paddock tested`,
                "type")#,
                #'issues/ comments')  


paddock_details <- paddock_done2020_t %>% 
  dplyr::select(`Paddock code`,
                Farmer,
                `Paddock tested`,
                Zone,
                `trial analysed`) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(paddock5_digits = substr(`Paddock code`, start = 1, stop = 5)) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(paddock5_digits = as.double(paddock5_digits)) %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(paddock5_digits_type = paste0(paddock5_digits,`trial analysed`))
                
paddock_done2020_display %>% 
   formattable(align = "l", - 1  )





```

Extra Notes:

- Most of these strips are narrow and don't contain much yield data, therefore the sample size per zone and strip tends to be smaller than some of the other sites.

# Site 1

### Harvest map

```{r display site 1, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

include_graphics(paste0(Growers_folder,site1,  harvest_map_site1))
```




### Yield trace

```{r display site 1 yld trace, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
include_graphics(paste0(Growers_folder,site1,  yld_trace_site1))
```

### Results


```{r display results site 1, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

image_read(dir(png_folder, full.names=T, pattern=site_name_1)) %>% 
  image_rotate(90)

```
